titleStmt.title: A sermon of the Epiphany preached in the Queen Dowagers chappel at Somerset-House, upon Twelfth Day, January the 6th. 1686. By John Betham, Doctor of Sorbon, and preacher in ordinary to his Majesty. Published by Her Majesties command.
titleStmt.author: Betham, John, d. 1709.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Matthew Turner, at the Lamb in Holborn,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
